keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
#:inoremap jk <esc>

# Inverse les mark global/local
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap

# Inverse les majuscules et minuscules de F O B T
map F LinkHints.activateMode
map f LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activate
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map T createTab
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

#map % à <c-[> ( echap ) 
#mapkey % <c-[>

#Recharge la page ainsi que le cache
map R reload hard

#Permet de déplacer un onglet de plusieurs onglets
map <a-'> moveTabLeft count=5
map <a-;> moveTabRight count=5

#Permet de se déplacer de plusieurs onglets
map <a-.> previousTab count=5
map <a-,> nextTab count=5
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
home: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/home/%s

recent: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Google (last year only)
tl: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator


w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
az: https://www.amazon.fr/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon

site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'


# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...

# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
